review.body:
Propelling

I read this book without putting it down. It was written beautifully, and the plot developed nicely.
There were awkward moments though that had me hyper aware of the narrator's voice. It didn't feel artistically intentional, but rather like the author was trying to fill the reader in on...

book.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets (Harry Potter, #2)

review.body: Life's not easy for Harry, his family died by an awful man. He lives with his mothers sister and her horrible son. Harry just wants to get out of this place and go back to his favorite school hogwarts. He gets a strange warring from a l Strange created names gobby. Gobby is a very weird creature...

I enjoyed this much much more than I thought I would, it's so easy to read- almost like a children's book, yet the content is clearly intended for adults only with the gore that makes it a typical thriller. This had a really captivating storyline and has really made me want to visit The Vatican....
VERY GOOD

Harlen Coben is one of my favourite authors so I knew I was in for a treat and wasn't disappointed. Maya Stern is a "retired" helicopter pilot - forced out of the army after an unfortunate incident which has left her troubled, her reputation damaged, and suffering with PTSD. It covers the issues...

book.title: Of Course I Love You...! Till I Find Someone Better...

review.body: nothing
A very sad and moving tale about young men struggling through the war in Iraq. This had some very powerful messages in it but is surprisingly easy to read. This will stay with you for a while.
rreview forthcoming on americanmicroreviews.com
I struggled with Gone Girl - didn't have the desire to finish it. Gave Sharp Objects a try and finished it in just a few days!
This book was beautifully written. Loved the changes in points of view. For the animal lovers, this one will touch your heart.

While clear in purpose if not necessarily plot, "Cannery Row" by John Steinbeck is a triumph of literary prose - a poetically told Depression era tale that leaves you feeling as if you just read a song as well as a story.
sexy as hell

لتحميل الكتاب PDF

http://www.4shared.com/office/KdJ99eV...

I really enjoyed reading this. I'm glad that I read the book first, because after watching half of the film, the book goes into so much more depth. This was very fast paced, and the author didn't drag it out to make it a longer story than it was.

book.title: Complications: A Surgeon's Notes on an Imperfect Science

review.body: It's an excellent read told by a powerful storyteller who asks some very good questions. It isn't that much different from a lot of other anecdotal medicine books out there, in my opinion.

"The first chapters introduce Kalumba and his close friends from the movement, Ogum and the less-privileged Sukena. Moreover, they relate the brutal repression—including the murder of Ogum’s father, a preacher—leading to Kalumba’s clandestine escape. Kalumba’s journal, the diary of an exiled acti...
GREAT

book.title: A Storm of Swords: Steel and Snow (A Song of Ice and Fire #3, Part 1 of 2)

review.body: Finally a Song of Ice and Fire book that is possible to read in a week without feeling overwhelmed! Though admittedly, this is only half of the third book. This has been my favourite in the series so far as there have been some really interesting developments now that I feel I know who all of the...

Epicità, Eroismo, Leggenda

La storia è semplice:

L’impero Drenai è in declino, Ulric è riuscito a unificare tutte le tribù Nadir del nord e forma così il piu’ grande esercito che un uomo ricordi. Non c’è trattato di pace che tenga, Ulric vuole la terra dei Dreani e per farlo deve passare dal DROSS...

book.title: Kiss and Make Up (Bachelors of Buttermilk Falls, #3)

review.body:
Brilliant

A sweet, hilarious, easy-reading trio of books! I love all the characters intermingled with each other and that small town feel! Makes me want to find Buttermilk Falls!!
